card.name: Afterlife
card.property: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller creates a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Alabaster Wall
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its mortar is mixed with waters straight from the Fountain of Cho.

card.name: Armistice

property.name: Flavor
property.value: We all must profit for peace to last. —Mercadian saying

card.name: Arrest
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Orim had no memory of the previous night—the first thing she could remember was waking up with the dead guard's blood on her hands.

card.name: Ballista Squad
card.property: {X} {W}, {T}: Ballista Squad deals X damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The perfect antidote for a tightly packed formation.

card.name: Charm Peddler
card.property: {W}, {T}, Discard a card: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Charmed Griffin
card.property: Flying When Charmed Griffin enters the battlefield, each other player may put an artifact or enchantment card onto the battlefield from their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Are you sure you can afford such a luxury?

card.name: Cho-Arrim Alchemist
Cho-Arrim Bruiser
card.property: Whenever Cho-Arrim Bruiser attacks, you may tap up to two target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He doesn't know why the Cho-Arrim fight the Mercadians, but he's happy to bash heads for them anyway.

card.name: Cho-Arrim Legate
card.property: If an opponent controls a Swamp and you control a Plains, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost. Protection from black

card.name: Cho-Manno, Revolutionary
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Cho-Manno, Revolutionary.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mercadia's masks can no longer hide the truth. Our day has come at last." —Cho-Manno

card.name: Cho-Manno's Blessing
card.property: Flash Enchant creature As Cho-Manno's Blessing enters the battlefield, choose a color. Enchanted creature has protection from the chosen color. This effect doesn't remove Cho-Manno's Blessing.

card.name: Common Cause
card.property: Nonartifact creatures get +2/+2 as long as they all share a color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mercadia City's troops are at their best when they have no enemy to fight.

card.name: Cornered Market
card.property: Players can't cast spells with the same name as a nontoken permanent. Players can't play nonbasic lands with the same name as a nontoken permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't step on the livelihood of other vendors, or they may step on you. —Mercadian saying

card.name: Crackdown
card.property: Nonwhite creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no place for mercy in defense of our lives." —Ta-Spon, Cho-Arrim executioner

card.name: Crossbow Infantry
card.property: {T}: Crossbow Infantry deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The crossbow is the ideal weapon for the lazy Mercadians: just point and shoot.

card.name: Devout Witness
card.property: {1} {W}, {T}, Discard a card: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Cho-Arrim fought Mercadia's decadence with more than just swords.

card.name: Disenchant
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The scepter of power is fragile in a calloused hand. —Cho-Arrim saying

card.name: Fountain Watch
card.property: Artifacts and enchantments you control have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Cho-Arrim didn't rely only on a secret location to protect their Fountain.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every Cho-Arrim villager is a potential warrior; when they are called, they abandon their peaceful way of life and take up arms to defend it.

card.name: Honor the Fallen
card.property: Exile all creature cards from all graveyards. You gain 1 life for each card exiled this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May the River claim Cho-Manno's body, wherever it lies." —Ta-Karnst, Cho-Arrim healer

card.name: Ignoble Soldier
card.property: Whenever Ignoble Soldier becomes blocked, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by it this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cowardice is a term invented by those with no cunning.

card.name: Inviolability
card.property: Enchant creature Prevent all damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A soldier's faith is magic strong enough to protect against any blade.

card.name: Ivory Mask
card.property: You have shroud. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I did not choose my role, Orim," said Cho-Manno patiently, "and I suspect Gerrard did not choose his."

card.name: Jhovall Queen
card.property: Vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: War-trained jhovalls eat twice their weight in war-trained soldiers daily.

card.name: Jhovall Rider
card.property: Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't be fooled by the riders' fluid grace—it takes years of practice to ride these beasts.

card.name: Last Breath
card.property: Exile target creature with power 2 or less. Its controller gains 4 life.

card.name: Moment of Silence
card.property: Target player skips their next combat phase this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The silence commemorates not those who've died, but those about to.

card.name: Moonlit Wake
card.property: Whenever a creature dies, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As long as Rushwood glows, no life is ever truly lost." —Ta-Karnst, Cho-Arrim healer

card.name: Muzzle
card.property: Enchant creature Prevent all damage that would be dealt by enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Clenched teeth do not bite. —Cho-Arrim saying

card.name: Nightwind Glider
card.property: Flying, protection from black

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once you learn to float on the shadows, you'll never fear them again.

card.name: Noble Purpose
card.property: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fighting for the right reason is itself a source of strength.

card.name: Orim's Cure
card.property: If you control a Plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

card.name: Pious Warrior
card.property: Whenever Pious Warrior is dealt combat damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Cho-Arrim make no distinction between healers and soldiers.

card.name: Ramosian Captain
card.property: First strike {5}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 4 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Cho-Arrim believe in leading by example.

card.name: Ramosian Commander
card.property: {6}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 5 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Cho-Manno guides your spirit. I guide your sword."

card.name: Ramosian Lieutenant
card.property: {4}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Give me your hand and I will give you victory."

card.name: Ramosian Rally
card.property: If you control a Plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Ramosian Sergeant
card.property: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 2 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her commands are part rallying cry, part sermon, and wholly undeniable.

card.name: Ramosian Sky Marshal
card.property: Flying {7}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 6 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Cho-Arrim fell from the sky onto Mercadia City like a vengeful rain.

card.name: Rappelling Scouts
card.property: Flying {2}{W}: Rappelling Scouts gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Renounce
card.property: Sacrifice any number of permanents. You gain 2 life for each permanent sacrificed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gerrard offered no defense to Orim's condemnation; the mission was under his command, and he was responsible.

card.name: Revered Elder
card.property: {1}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Revered Elder this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Cho-Arrim worship life and revere those who've experienced it longest.

card.name: Reverent Mantra
card.property: You may exile a white card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Choose a color. All creatures gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

card.name: Righteous Aura
card.property: {W}, Pay 2 life: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is a great difference between pain and injury." —Cho-Manno

card.name: Righteous Indignation
card.property: Whenever a creature blocks a black or red creature, the blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You are the disease that plagues Mercadia. I am the healer's knife that will cut you out."

card.name: Security Detail
card.property: {W} {W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token. Activate this ability only if you control no creatures and only once each turn.

card.name: Soothing Balm
card.property: Target player gains 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Orim taught Ta-Karnst and the other Cho-Arrim healers a far less invasive method of healing.

card.name: Spiritual Focus
card.property: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard a card, you gain 2 life and you may draw a card.

card.name: Steadfast Guard
card.property: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Mercadians were prepared for the guard, but the guard was even more prepared for the Mercadians.

card.name: Story Circle
card.property: As Story Circle enters the battlefield, choose a color. {W}: The next time a source of your choice of the chosen color would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Task Force
card.property: Whenever Task Force becomes the target of a spell or ability, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They are the reflection of Rushwood's glow on the edge of a wooden sword.

card.name: Thermal Glider
card.property: Flying, protection from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Mercadians are too busy looking down on us to see us coming." —Cho-Arrim rebel

card.name: Tonic Peddler
card.property: {W}, {T}, Discard a card: Target player gains 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The price is written at the bottom of the cup."

card.name: Trap Runner
card.property: {T}: Target unblocked attacking creature becomes blocked. Activate this ability only during combat after blockers are declared. (This ability works on creatures that can't be blocked.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How could I catch her when the trees conspired to stop me?"

card.name: Wave of Reckoning
card.property: Each creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Inner conflict can defeat a soldier more quickly than any army.

card.name: Wishmonger
card.property: {2}: Target creature gains protection from the color of its controller's choice until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's not what you ask for, but how you ask for it."

card.name: Aerial Caravan
card.property: Flying {1}{U}{U}: Exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card. (Reveal the card as you exile it.)

card.name: Balloon Peddler
card.property: {U}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The market festival turned out to be the high point of Jaffy's visit.

card.name: Blockade Runner
card.property: {U}: Blockade Runner can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I need to get back to Mercadia City," said Sisay. "We can get you there," the vizier answered. "Easily."

card.name: Brainstorm
card.property: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I see more than others do because I know where to look." —Saprazzan vizier

card.name: Bribery
card.property: Search target opponent's library for a creature card and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Mercadia City, loyalties extend only as far as your purse can stretch.

card.name: Buoyancy
card.property: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Saprazzan merfolk become legged on land, but some find it quicker to bring the water with them.

card.name: Chambered Nautilus
card.property: Whenever Chambered Nautilus becomes blocked, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What's merely a home for the nautilus can become exquisite jewelry in the hands of Saprazzan artisans.

card.name: Chameleon Spirit
card.property: As Chameleon Spirit enters the battlefield, choose a color. Chameleon Spirit's power and toughness are each equal to the number of permanents of the chosen color your opponents control.

card.name: Charisma
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a creature, gain control of the other creature for as long as Charisma remains on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It was Gerrard's nature to lead and the Mercadians' to follow.

card.name: Cloud Sprite
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Cloud Sprite can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The delicate sprites carry messages for Saprazzans, but they refuse to land in Mercadia City's filthy markets.

card.name: Coastal Piracy
card.property: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't like to think of myself as a pirate. I'm more like a stimulator of the local economy."

card.name: Counterspell
card.property: Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your attack has been rendered harmless. It is, however, quite pretty." —Saprazzan vizier

card.name: Cowardice
card.property: Whenever a creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, return that creature to its owner's hand. (It won't be affected by the spell or ability.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gerrard was the Mercadian soldiers' greatest hero; they followed him blindly. When he left, they stumbled around blindly.

card.name: Customs Depot
card.property: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A bribe is always faster than filling out paperwork.

card.name: Darting Merfolk
card.property: {U}: Return Darting Merfolk to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You might as well try to catch water with a net.

card.name: Dehydration
card.property: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You say Saprazzo is a city built on water? I hope they have enough to wash the dust from my throat." —Sisay

card.name: Diplomatic Escort
card.property: {U}, {T}, Discard a card: Counter target spell or ability that targets a creature.

card.name: Diplomatic Immunity
card.property: Enchant creature Shroud (A permanent with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Enchanted creature has shroud.

card.name: Drake Hatchling
card.property: Flying {U}: Drake Hatchling gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is beauty in the space between learning to fly and taking it for granted.

card.name: Embargo
card.property: Nonland permanents don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life.

card.name: Energy Flux
card.property: All artifacts have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay {2}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Karn said nothing—he just grasped the powerstone and squeezed tightly. The wild flashing ceased.

card.name: Extravagant Spirit
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Extravagant Spirit unless you pay {1} for each card in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fewer your possessions, the fewer your worries.

card.name: False Demise
card.property: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Go down there and fish him out. Maybe his hide will fetch a price."

card.name: Glowing Anemone
card.property: When Glowing Anemone enters the battlefield, you may return target land to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beautiful to behold, terrible to be held.

card.name: Gush
card.property: You may return two Islands you control to their owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't trust your secrets to the sea.

card.name: High Seas
card.property: Red creature spells and green creature spells cost {1} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bend as the wave breaks or it will break you as well. —Saprazzan saying

card.name: Hoodwink
card.property: Return target artifact, enchantment, or land to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The youths of Rishada's marketplace are always ready for a quick footrace.

card.name: Indentured Djinn
card.property: Flying When Indentured Djinn enters the battlefield, each other player may draw up to three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's not always clear who's the master and who's the servant.

card.name: Karn's Touch
card.property: Target noncreature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost until end of turn. (It retains its abilities.)

card.name: Misdirection
card.property: You may exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Change the target of target spell with a single target.

card.name: Misstep
card.property: Creatures target player controls don't untap during that player's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The feet have no eyes. —Saprazzan saying

card.name: Overtaker
card.property: {3} {U}, {T}, Discard a card: Untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's no challenge to master a Mercadian."

card.name: Port Inspector
card.property: Whenever Port Inspector becomes blocked, you may look at defending player's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There may be a few minor additional fees, levies, duties, surtaxes, tariffs, imposts, tolls . . . ."

card.name: Rishadan Airship
card.property: Flying Rishadan Airship can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The view is truly spectacular—as long as you don't look at Rishada itself.

card.name: Rishadan Brigand
card.property: Flying When Rishadan Brigand enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a permanent unless they pay {3}. Rishadan Brigand can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Rishadan Cutpurse
card.property: When Rishadan Cutpurse enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a permanent unless they pay {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bigger the purse, the greater the fool. —Rishadan saying

card.name: Rishadan Footpad
card.property: When Rishadan Footpad enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a permanent unless they pay {2}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best things in life are free. Money, for instance."

card.name: Sailmonger
card.property: {2}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Clients who cheat the sailmonger make an impact on the rest.

card.name: Sand Squid
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) You may choose not to untap Sand Squid during your untap step. {T}: Tap target creature. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Sand Squid remains tapped.

card.name: Saprazzan Bailiff
card.property: When Saprazzan Bailiff enters the battlefield, exile all artifact and enchantment cards from all graveyards. When Saprazzan Bailiff leaves the battlefield, return all artifact and enchantment cards from all graveyards to their owners' hands.

card.name: Saprazzan Breaker
card.property: {U}: Put the top card of your library into your graveyard. If that card is a land card, Saprazzan Breaker can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Saprazzan Heir
card.property: Whenever Saprazzan Heir becomes blocked, you may draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Within the walls of the floating city, Saprazzan wealth is like Saprazzan water: abundant, free-flowing, and accessible to all.

card.name: Saprazzan Legate
card.property: If an opponent controls a Mountain and you control an Island, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost. Flying

card.name: Saprazzan Outrigger
card.property: When Saprazzan Outrigger attacks or blocks, put it on top of its owner's library at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Saprazzans excel at both tactics: hit and run.

card.name: Saprazzan Raider
card.property: When Saprazzan Raider becomes blocked, return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some quick dagger work and then back to the sea—that's the Saprazzan way.

card.name: Shoving Match
card.property: Until end of turn, all creatures gain "{T}: Tap target creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rishadan barkeeps know something the Mercadians have yet to learn: if you keep pushing, someone will eventually push back.

card.name: Soothsaying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vizier's wisdom proved invaluable in untangling the Mercadian knot of lies.

card.name: Squeeze
card.property: Sorcery spells cost {3} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Any pirate would prefer Rishada's swift and cruel justice to Saprazzo's patient punishments.

card.name: Statecraft
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Inside these walls, peace; outside, sharks. You choose."—Saprazzan vizier

card.name: Stinging Barrier
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {U}, {T}: Stinging Barrier deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Thwart
card.property: You may return three Islands you control to their owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target spell.

card.name: Tidal Bore
card.property: You may return an Island you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. You may tap or untap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dry riverbed became a raging torrent, and the Cho-Arrim claimed their prize.

card.name: Tidal Kraken
card.property: Tidal Kraken can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To merfolk, pirates are a nuisance. To pirates, merfolk are a threat. To the kraken, they're both appetizers.

card.name: Timid Drake
card.property: Flying When another creature enters the battlefield, return Timid Drake to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It flees from anything that isn't shaped like a cloud.

card.name: Trade Routes
card.property: {1}: Return target land you control to its owner's hand. {1}, Discard a land card: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like the price of goods, the value of the routes was renegotiated daily.

card.name: War Tax
card.property: {X} {U}: This turn, creatures can't attack unless their controller pays {X} for each attacking creature they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The worst thing about being a depraved pirate is having to work with a bunch of depraved pirates.

card.name: Waterfront Bouncer
card.property: {U}, {T}, Discard a card: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Closing time comes earlier to some than to others.

card.name: Alley Grifters
card.property: Whenever Alley Grifters becomes blocked, defending player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One distracts the victim, the other extracts the valuables.

card.name: Black Market
card.property: Whenever a creature dies, put a charge counter on Black Market. At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add {B} for each charge counter on Black Market.

card.name: Bog Smugglers
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They slide over the bog like oil across glass.

card.name: Bog Witch
card.property: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Add {B}{B}{B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The world is the body. The mana is the blood. The witch is the surgeon.

card.name: Cackling Witch
card.property: {X} {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The touch of his madness can drive anyone into a killing frenzy.

card.name: Cateran Brute
card.property: {2}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 2 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Cateran guild prefers to call them "public relations."

card.name: Cateran Enforcer
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) {4}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 4 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Cateran Kidnappers
card.property: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Cateran Overlord
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Cateran Overlord. {6}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 6 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Cateran Persuader
card.property: {1}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 1 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Cateran Slaver
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) {5}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 5 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Cateran Summons
card.property: Search your library for a Mercenary card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even when recruitment is slow, the guild can always cook something up.

card.name: Conspiracy
card.property: As Conspiracy enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures you control are the chosen type. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.

card.name: Corrupt Official

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His favor comes at a high price.

card.name: Dark Ritual
card.property: Add {B}{B}{B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Eye of twilight, give us sight. Take our offer, give us might. Make our power tears of night."

card.name: Deathgazer
card.property: Whenever Deathgazer blocks or becomes blocked by a nonblack creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

card.name: Deepwood Ghoul
card.property: Pay 2 life: Regenerate Deepwood Ghoul.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They feed on the living to stay undead.

card.name: Deepwood Legate
card.property: If an opponent controls a Forest and you control a Swamp, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost. {B}: Deepwood Legate gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Delraich
card.property: You may sacrifice three black creatures rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It wears the souls of its victims like jewels on a chain.

card.name: Enslaved Horror
card.property: When Enslaved Horror enters the battlefield, each other player may return a creature card from their graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Extortion
card.property: Look at target player's hand and choose up to two cards from it. That player discards those cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The enforcers make no effort to distinguish gold from flesh.

card.name: Forced March
card.property: Destroy all creatures with converted mana cost X or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Caterans call it a screening process. The dead are in no condition to argue.

card.name: Ghoul's Feast
card.property: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mercadians not wealthy enough to buy a tomb are thrown into a bog called "the Ghoul's Larder."

card.name: Haunted Crossroads
card.property: {B}: Put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It seemed as if no one wanted them to reach the Henge of Ramos—not even the dead.

card.name: Highway Robber
card.property: When Highway Robber enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tonight, madam, it's your money and your life."

card.name: Instigator

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The desecration of their dead makes even the Saprazzans careless.

card.name: Insubordination
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of the end step of enchanted creature's controller, Insubordination deals 2 damage to that player unless that creature attacked this turn.

card.name: Intimidation
card.property: Creatures you control have fear. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If they move, kill them. In fact, kill one now to make sure the other understands."

card.name: Larceny
card.property: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

card.name: Liability
card.property: Whenever a nontoken permanent is put into a player's graveyard from the battlefield, that player loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gerrard realized that the helpless woman they'd rescued from Rath was nothing of the sort.

card.name: Maggot Therapy
card.property: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/-2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If this is the cure, I'd hate to see the disease." —Orim

card.name: Midnight Ritual
card.property: Exile X target creature cards from your graveyard. For each creature card exiled this way, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bury old friends deeply, lest they return bearing worms.

card.name: Misshapen Fiend
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You'd scarcely believe they could fly until they drop out of the sky onto you.

card.name: Molting Harpy
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Molting Harpy unless you pay {2}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shed harpy feathers leave painful wounds—which explains the harpies' mood.

card.name: Nether Spirit
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if Nether Spirit is the only creature card in your graveyard, you may return Nether Spirit to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It roams in both the worlds of the living and the dead but belongs to neither.

card.name: Notorious Assassin
card.property: {2} {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He wears his infamy like a fine silk shirt.

card.name: Pretender's Claim
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature becomes blocked, tap all lands defending player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The surest way to lose your holdings is to plead for them in Mercadia City's courts.

card.name: Primeval Shambler
card.property: {B}: Primeval Shambler gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His mind, like his body, is made up of the swamp's flotsam.

card.name: Putrefaction
card.property: Whenever a player casts a green or white spell, that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do you want to be alive or whole?" —Ta-Karnst, Cho-Arrim healer

card.name: Quagmire Lamprey
card.property: Whenever Quagmire Lamprey becomes blocked by a creature, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature.

card.name: Rain of Tears
card.property: Destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mercadian elitism is reinforced daily by physical position: their neighbors are literally beneath them and are treated accordingly.

card.name: Rampart Crawler
card.property: Rampart Crawler can't be blocked by Walls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Not even the magistrate in his lofty tower is out of our reach." —Cateran overlord

card.name: Rouse
card.property: If you control a Swamp, you may pay 2 life rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Scandalmonger
card.property: {2}: Target player discards a card. Any player may activate this ability but only any time they could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Silence costs extra. Breaking it costs extra still.

card.name: Sever Soul
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. You gain life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With the proper tools, even the Great River can be dammed." —Ta-Spon, Cho-Arrim executioner

card.name: Silent Assassin
card.property: {3} {B}: Destroy target blocking creature at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She feels no need to disturb her victim's slumber.

card.name: Skulking Fugitive
card.property: When Skulking Fugitive becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the Cateran guild, being caught is a capital offense.

card.name: Snuff Out
card.property: If you control a Swamp, you may pay 4 life rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Squee watched his Kyren cousins fall with a mixture of sympathy and relief.

card.name: Soul Channeling
card.property: Enchant creature Pay 2 life: Regenerate enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Driven by masters more terrible than the Mercadians could imagine, the dark overseers would pay any price to keep their shipwrights working.

card.name: Specter's Wail
card.property: Target player discards a card at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As he gritted his teeth to focus through the pain, Tahngarth glanced at Takara. She seemed completely unaffected.

card.name: Strongarm Thug
card.property: When Strongarm Thug enters the battlefield, you may return target Mercenary card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No, I insist—let me carry all that heavy jewelry."

card.name: Thrashing Wumpus
card.property: {B}: Thrashing Wumpus deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Young wumpuses are malevolent and vicious—but they grow out of it.

card.name: Undertaker
card.property: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The weight of death is heavy but not immovable.

card.name: Unmask
card.property: You may exile a black card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Unnatural Hunger
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Unnatural Hunger deals damage equal to that creature's power to that player unless they sacrifice another creature.

card.name: Vendetta
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. You lose life equal to that creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Starke knew the voice was Takara's, but the venom was Volrath's.

card.name: Wall of Distortion
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {2}{B}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Arms Dealer
card.property: {1} {R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Arms Dealer deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He has the weapons, he has the connections, and he knows the hangar's dark secret.

card.name: Battle Rampart
card.property: Defender {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Battle Squadron
card.property: Flying Battle Squadron's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The goblins made an unruly pile with military precision.

card.name: Blaster Mage
card.property: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Destroy target Wall.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't get up. I'll show myself out."

card.name: Blood Hound
card.property: Whenever you're dealt damage, you may put that many +1/+1 counters on Blood Hound. At the beginning of your end step, remove all +1/+1 counters from Blood Hound.

card.name: Blood Oath
card.property: Choose a card type. Target opponent reveals their hand. Blood Oath deals 3 damage to that player for each card of the chosen type revealed this way. (Artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal are card types.)

card.name: Brawl
card.property: Until end of turn, all creatures gain "{T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Anything can happen when patience is scarce and wine is abundant.

card.name: Cave Sense
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has mountainwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

card.name: Cave-In
card.property: You may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Cave-In deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One fleet was gone; others were poised.

card.name: Cavern Crawler
card.property: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.) {R}: Cavern Crawler gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Ceremonial Guard
card.property: When Ceremonial Guard attacks or blocks, destroy it at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These guards are the most disciplined military unit in the city. They couldn't fight their way out of a broom closet, but they've got discipline." —Gerrard, to Sisay

card.name: Cinder Elemental
card.property: {X} {R}, {T}, Sacrifice Cinder Elemental: It deals X damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their rage can grow to such proportions that they explode in a cloud of fire.

card.name: Close Quarters
card.property: Whenever a creature you control becomes blocked, Close Quarters deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Mercadians' ineptitude in close combat sometimes accidentally pays off.

card.name: Crag Saurian
card.property: Whenever a source deals damage to Crag Saurian, that source's controller gains control of Crag Saurian.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It follows the strongest leader—the one with the longest whip.

card.name: Crash
card.property: You may sacrifice a Mountain rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gerrard shook his head as the ground rushed to meet him. "This," he thought, "is not the start I was hoping for."

card.name: Flailing Manticore
card.property: Flying, first strike {1}: Flailing Manticore gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability. {1}: Flailing Manticore gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Flailing Ogre
card.property: {1}: Flailing Ogre gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability. {1}: Flailing Ogre gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Flailing Soldier
card.property: {1}: Flailing Soldier gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability. {1}: Flailing Soldier gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Flaming Sword
card.property: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's not Talruum crystal, but I must admit—it gets the job done." —Tahngarth

card.name: Furious Assault
card.property: Whenever you cast a creature spell, Furious Assault deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Does it burn, Saprazzan? Do you wish you had never raised arms against us?" —Kyren overseer

card.name: Gerrard's Irregulars
card.property: Trample, haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Had Gerrard realized he'd end up fighting against them, he might not have trained them so well.

card.name: Hammer Mage
card.property: {X} {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Destroy all artifacts with converted mana cost X or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When he's holding the hammers, everything looks like a nail.

card.name: Hired Giant
card.property: When Hired Giant enters the battlefield, each other player may search their library for a land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then each player who searched their library this way shuffles it.

card.name: Kris Mage
card.property: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Kris Mage deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her blade draws blood without ever touching its target.

card.name: Kyren Glider
card.property: Flying Kyren Glider can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mercadia's Kyren goblins are the opposite of Dominarian goblins: they're smart and cowardly.

card.name: Kyren Legate
card.property: If an opponent controls a Plains and you control a Mountain, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost. Haste

card.name: Kyren Negotiations
card.property: Tap an untapped creature you control: Kyren Negotiations deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kyren goblins always speak in questions and never allow wrong answers.

card.name: Kyren Sniper
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have Kyren Sniper deal 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kyren goblins always act behind the scenes—even in battle.

card.name: Lava Runner
card.property: Haste Whenever Lava Runner becomes the target of a spell or ability, that spell or ability's controller sacrifices a land.

card.name: Lightning Hounds
card.property: First strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Quick enough to avoid jhovalls when alone and fierce enough to attack them in packs, the hounds were as at home in the mountains as the Mercadians were atop theirs.

card.name: Lithophage
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Lithophage unless you sacrifice a Mountain.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's viciously territorial, destroying every creature on the mountain it has chosen to consume.

card.name: Lunge
card.property: Lunge deals 2 damage to target creature and 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cho-Arrim righteousness was no match for Benalish combat training.

card.name: Magistrate's Veto
card.property: White creatures and blue creatures can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The magistrate had been the goblins' puppet for so long that he made the right decisions with little prompting.

card.name: Mercadia's Downfall
card.property: Each attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each nonbasic land defending player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With an explosion that shook the foundation of the city, the Weatherlight burst from the underground hangar.

card.name: Ogre Taskmaster
card.property: Ogre Taskmaster can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He doesn't have to be smart—his masters only ever give him one command.

card.name: Pulverize
card.property: You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Destroy all artifacts.

card.name: Puppet's Verdict
card.property: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, destroy all creatures with power 2 or less. If you lose the flip, destroy all creatures with power 3 or greater.

card.name: Robber Fly
card.property: Flying Whenever Robber Fly becomes blocked, defending player discards all the cards in their hand, then draws that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In pursuit of the juicy fly, Squee stumbled on the hidden hangar.

card.name: Rock Badger
card.property: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Kyren goblins created most of the inverted mountain's tunnels simply by driving the beast before them.

card.name: Seismic Mage
card.property: {2} {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ground shakes when he walks. His customers shake if they're late with his fee.

card.name: Shock Troops
card.property: Sacrifice Shock Troops: It deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When goblins blow themselves up, it's called stupidity. When humans do, it's called heroism.

card.name: Sizzle
card.property: Sizzle deals 3 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Explosions ripped through the ship overhead, and those unfortunate enough to be directly below scrambled to find cover.

card.name: Squee, Goblin Nabob
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return Squee, Goblin Nabob from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Stone Rain
card.property: Destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The return of Ramos was foretold by devastating natural disasters and unnatural storms.

card.name: Tectonic Break
card.property: Each player sacrifices X lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the foolish and the rich build their houses where the land is thin and the ocean is near.

card.name: Territorial Dispute
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Territorial Dispute unless you sacrifice a land. Players can't play lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bit by bit, Mercadia City had forced the Cho-Arrim from their ancestral lands. They would be pushed no further.

card.name: Thieves' Auction
card.property: Exile all nontoken permanents. Starting with you, each player chooses one of the exiled cards and puts it onto the battlefield tapped under their control. Repeat this process until all cards exiled this way have been chosen.

card.name: Thunderclap
card.property: You may sacrifice a Mountain rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Thunderclap deals 3 damage to target creature.

card.name: Tremor
card.property: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without a word, Gerrard and Sisay ran deeper into the mountain. Neither of them intended to leave Mercadia without the Weatherlight and its crew.

card.name: Two-Headed Dragon
card.property: Flying Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Two-Headed Dragon can block an additional creature each combat. {1}{R}: Two-Headed Dragon gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Uphill Battle
card.property: Creatures played by your opponents enter the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cho-Manno knew he had no choice but to ally with Gerrard. If that's what it took to free his people, he'd pay the price.

card.name: Volcanic Wind
card.property: Volcanic Wind deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield as you cast this spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Cho-Arrim call it "the fury of Ramos."

card.name: War Cadence
card.property: {X} {R}: This turn, creatures can't block unless their controller pays {X} for each blocking creature they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rhythm isn't a call to arms, but a signal that the goblins have made a new enemy.

card.name: Warmonger
card.property: {2}: Warmonger deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Funny how money and war travel so well together.

card.name: Warpath
card.property: Warpath deals 3 damage to each blocking creature and each blocked creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cho-Manno had never seen Mercadia City's forces fight so well. The magistrate must have hired a new hero.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jhovalls sharpen their claws on trees—or on Mercadians, if no trees are handy.

card.name: Word of Blasting
card.property: Destroy target Wall. It can't be regenerated. Word of Blasting deals damage equal to that Wall's converted mana cost to the Wall's controller.

card.name: Ancestral Mask
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 for each other enchantment on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The masks, like the ancient trees they're grown from, lend strength to the dryads.

card.name: Bifurcate
card.property: Search your library for a permanent card with the same name as target nontoken creature and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Boa Constrictor
card.property: {T}: Boa Constrictor gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its eyes are bigger than its stomach, but its mouth is larger still.

card.name: Briar Patch
card.property: Whenever a creature attacks you, it gets -1/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As easily as the dryads could close a fist, so could the branches and underbrush entangle.

card.name: Caller of the Hunt
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, choose a creature type. Caller of the Hunt's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures of the chosen type on the battlefield.

card.name: Caustic Wasps
card.property: Flying Whenever Caustic Wasps deals combat damage to a player, you may destroy target artifact that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the wasp knows how to pay the magistrate his due respect.

card.name: Clear the Land
card.property: Each player reveals the top five cards of their library, puts all land cards revealed this way onto the battlefield tapped, and exiles the rest.

card.name: Collective Unconscious
card.property: Draw a card for each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gerrard knew little of Ramos, the sky god they worshiped. But he felt the power of the chant.

card.name: Dawnstrider
card.property: {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Morning's mists can hide many things.

card.name: Deadly Insect
card.property: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With his newfound sense of self-importance, Squee set his sights on ever-bigger bugs.

card.name: Deepwood Drummer
card.property: {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Deepwood Elder

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They'd guarded the Henge so long that they were as attuned to the powerstones as they were to the trees.

card.name: Deepwood Tantiv
card.property: Whenever Deepwood Tantiv becomes blocked, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A single tantiv is just as dangerous as a herd.

card.name: Deepwood Wolverine
card.property: Whenever Deepwood Wolverine becomes blocked, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The jhovalls are depleting its food sources, the Mercadians are eroding its home, and you're wondering why it's angry?

card.name: Desert Twister
card.property: Destroy target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The magical dust clouds Mercadian mages use to traverse the plane generate storms that devastate the surrounding terrain. But as long as the storms don't touch the mountain, the nobles simply don't care.

card.name: Erithizon
card.property: Whenever Erithizon attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature of defending player's choice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unlike scorpions, the erithizon isn't immune to its own weaponry.

card.name: Ferocity
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked, you may put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You lot go on ahead. I'll keep killing them until it sticks." —Tahngarth

card.name: Food Chain
card.property: Exile a creature you control: Add X mana of any one color, where X is 1 plus the exiled creature's converted mana cost. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.

card.name: Foster
card.property: Whenever a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Game Preserve
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player reveals the top card of their library. If all cards revealed this way are creature cards, put those cards onto the battlefield under their owners' control.

card.name: Giant Caterpillar
card.property: {G}, Sacrifice Giant Caterpillar: Create a 1/1 green Insect creature token with flying named Butterfly at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Groundskeeper
card.property: {1} {G}: Return target basic land card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whereas the rebels fight to defend the land, they work to renew it.

card.name: Horned Troll
card.property: {G}: Regenerate Horned Troll.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If I says it's a troll, it's a troll. Goblins is always right in Mercadia." —Squee

card.name: Howling Wolf
card.property: When Howling Wolf enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Howling Wolf, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Hunted Wumpus
card.property: When Hunted Wumpus enters the battlefield, each other player may put a creature card from their hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just one can feed a dozen people for a month.

card.name: Invigorate
card.property: If you control a Forest, rather than pay this spell's mana cost, you may have an opponent gain 3 life. Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Land Grant
card.property: If you have no land cards in hand, you may reveal your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Search your library for a Forest card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Ley Line
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature of their choice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can feel the strength of the entire forest." —Gerrard

card.name: Lumbering Satyr
card.property: All creatures have forestwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The satyr carves the path that all of Rushwood follows. —Cho-Arrim saying

card.name: Lure
card.property: Enchant creature All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Deepwood's reach is not long, so it invites its enemies in.

card.name: Megatherium
card.property: Trample When Megatherium enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1} for each card in your hand.

card.name: Natural Affinity
card.property: All lands become 2/2 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As long as the dryads are a part of the forest, the forest is a part of the army.

card.name: Pangosaur
card.property: Whenever a player plays a land, return Pangosaur to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only Rushwood is vast enough to swallow this creature whole.

card.name: Revive
card.property: Return target green card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gerrard's heart ached, recalling the living wreath Mirri laid for her dead kin. No such memorial was left for her in Rath.

card.name: Rushwood Dryad
card.property: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rushwood is a living jewel that reflects its dwellers' hearts.

card.name: Rushwood Elemental
card.property: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Rushwood Elemental.

card.name: Rushwood Herbalist
card.property: {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Regenerate target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When generals gather their armies, healers gather their herbs.

card.name: Rushwood Legate
card.property: If an opponent controls an Island and you control a Forest, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Saber Ants
card.property: Whenever Saber Ants is dealt damage, you may create that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They stay on the battlefield only long enough to consume the losers.

card.name: Sacred Prey
card.property: Whenever Sacred Prey becomes blocked, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To see one is a good omen to the Cho-Arrim.

card.name: Silverglade Elemental
card.property: When Silverglade Elemental enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Silverglade Pathfinder
card.property: {1} {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Snake Pit
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a blue or black spell, you may create a 1/1 green Snake creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If the ground is smooth, the way will be rough. —Deepwood saying

card.name: Snorting Gahr
card.property: Whenever Snorting Gahr becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's little advantage to surprising the gahr.

card.name: Spidersilk Armor
card.property: Creatures you control get +0/+1 and have reach. (They can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It hardly weighs anything, but it takes all day to remove.

card.name: Spontaneous Generation
card.property: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token for each card in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Saprolings always thrive on the ruins of others, and Mercadia ruins more than most.

card.name: Squall
card.property: Squall deals 2 damage to each creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The air that holds them aloft can just as easily put them down.

card.name: Squallmonger
card.property: {2}: Squallmonger deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Squall, gale, hurricane—it's all a matter of size . . . and price."

card.name: Stamina
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has vigilance. Sacrifice Stamina: Regenerate enchanted creature.

card.name: Sustenance
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice a land: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like the dryads, the forest itself willingly gives up some of its life for the sake of the future.

card.name: Tiger Claws
card.property: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cho-Arrim martial artists emulate the beasts of their home.

card.name: Tranquility
card.property: Destroy all enchantments.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sisay had been restored to her place on the ship, the Legacy had been recovered, and the Weatherlight was sailing home to Dominaria. Gerrard focused on the debts he'd settled . . . and on those he'd soon collect.

card.name: Venomous Breath
card.property: Choose target creature. At this turn's next end of combat, destroy all creatures that blocked or were blocked by it this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dryads need neither size nor strength to defeat their enemies in battle.

card.name: Venomous Dragonfly
card.property: Flying Whenever Venomous Dragonfly blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A pretty little death is still death.

card.name: Vernal Equinox
card.property: Any player may cast creature and enchantment spells as though they had flash.

card.name: Vine Dryad
card.property: You may exile a green card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Flash Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

card.name: Vine Trellis
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {T}: Add {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We protect our own with our own."

card.name: Assembly Hall
card.property: {4}, {T}: Reveal a creature card in your hand. Search your library for a card with the same name as that card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Barbed Wire
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Barbed Wire deals 1 damage to that player. {2}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt by Barbed Wire this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A steel snake with ten thousand teeth.

card.name: Bargaining Table
card.property: {X}, {T}: Draw a card. X is the number of cards in an opponent's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Although it looks like a game, business around the table is deadly serious.

card.name: Credit Voucher
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Credit Voucher: Shuffle any number of cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.

card.name: Crenellated Wall
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {T}: Target creature gets +0/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mercadian soldiers excel at finding things to stand behind.

card.name: Crooked Scales
card.property: {4}, {T}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, destroy target creature an opponent controls. If you lose the flip, destroy target creature you control unless you pay {3} and repeat this process.

card.name: Crumbling Sanctuary
card.property: If damage would be dealt to a player, that player exiles that many cards from the top of their library instead.

card.name: Distorting Lens
card.property: {T}: Target permanent becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The magistrate seems to prefer a distorted perspective of reality.

card.name: Eye of Ramos
card.property: {T}: Add {U}. Sacrifice Eye of Ramos: Add {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ramos wept, and there were seas.

card.name: General's Regalia
card.property: {3}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, that damage is dealt to target creature you control instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A uniform fit for a goblin.

card.name: Heart of Ramos
card.property: {T}: Add {R}. Sacrifice Heart of Ramos: Add {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ramos bled, and there was fire.

card.name: Henge Guardian
card.property: {2}: Henge Guardian gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like so many Thran relics, the wurm engine kept operating long after its creators were gone.

card.name: Horn of Plenty
card.property: Whenever a player casts a spell, they may pay {1}. If the player does, they draw a card at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This horn is an exact replica of the fabled Horn of Ramos, except mine is more lavish." —Mercadian magistrate

card.name: Horn of Ramos
card.property: {T}: Add {G}. Sacrifice Horn of Ramos: Add {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ramos touched, and there was life.

card.name: Iron Lance
card.property: {3}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The only way to get Mercadians to fight on the front lines is to give them really long weapons." —Gerrard

card.name: Jeweled Torque
card.property: As Jeweled Torque enters the battlefield, choose a color. Whenever a player casts a spell of the chosen color, you may pay {2}. If you do, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Kyren Archive
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile the top card of your library face down. {5}, Discard your hand, Sacrifice Kyren Archive: Put all cards exiled with Kyren Archive into their owner's hand.

card.name: Kyren Toy
card.property: {1}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Kyren Toy. {T}, Remove X charge counters from Kyren Toy: Add an amount of {C} equal to X plus one.

card.name: Magistrate's Scepter
card.property: {4}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Magistrate's Scepter. {T}, Remove three charge counters from Magistrate's Scepter: Take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Mercadian Atlas
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, if you didn't play a land this turn, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One may as well chart the clouds as try to map Mercadia.

card.name: Mercadian Lift
card.property: {1}, {T}: Put a winch counter on Mercadian Lift. {T}, Remove X winch counters from Mercadian Lift: You may put a creature card with converted mana cost X from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Monkey Cage
card.property: When a creature enters the battlefield, sacrifice Monkey Cage and create X 2/2 green Monkey creature tokens, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.

card.name: Panacea
card.property: {X} {X}, {T}: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A drop numbs the tongue. A sip sends the heart racing. A draught reforges the body.

card.name: Power Matrix
card.property: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying, first strike, and trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As he repaired the ship's planeswalking engine, Karn saw for the first time how he could catalyze the Weatherlight's evolution.

card.name: Puffer Extract
card.property: {X}, {T}: Target creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn. Destroy it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The puffer's flesh is the deadliest in the sea—and therefore the most useful.

card.name: Rishadan Pawnshop
card.property: {2}, {T}: Shuffle target nontoken permanent you control into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Everything comes to the waterfront eventually, on the tide or on credit.

card.name: Skull of Ramos
card.property: {T}: Add {B}. Sacrifice Skull of Ramos: Add {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ramos fell, and there was night.

card.name: Tooth of Ramos
card.property: {T}: Add {W}. Sacrifice Tooth of Ramos: Add {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ramos smiled, and there was day.

card.name: Toymaker
card.property: {1}, {T}, Discard a card: Target noncreature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost until end of turn. (It retains its abilities.)

card.name: Worry Beads
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.

card.name: Dust Bowl
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice a land: Destroy target nonbasic land.

card.name: Fountain of Cho
card.property: Fountain of Cho enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Put a storage counter on Fountain of Cho. {T}, Remove any number of storage counters from Fountain of Cho: Add {W} for each storage counter removed this way.

card.name: Henge of Ramos
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is the hub. We are the wheel. —Dryad saying

card.name: Hickory Woodlot
card.property: Hickory Woodlot enters the battlefield tapped with two depletion counters on it. {T}, Remove a depletion counter from Hickory Woodlot: Add {G}{G}. If there are no depletion counters on Hickory Woodlot, sacrifice it.

card.name: High Market
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If it can't be had here, it can't be had on any world.

card.name: Mercadian Bazaar
card.property: Mercadian Bazaar enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Put a storage counter on Mercadian Bazaar. {T}, Remove any number of storage counters from Mercadian Bazaar: Add {R} for each storage counter removed this way.

card.name: Peat Bog
card.property: Peat Bog enters the battlefield tapped with two depletion counters on it. {T}, Remove a depletion counter from Peat Bog: Add {B}{B}. If there are no depletion counters on Peat Bog, sacrifice it.

card.name: Remote Farm
card.property: Remote Farm enters the battlefield tapped with two depletion counters on it. {T}, Remove a depletion counter from Remote Farm: Add {W}{W}. If there are no depletion counters on Remote Farm, sacrifice it.

card.name: Rishadan Port
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Tap target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rishada is the gateway to free trade—but the key will cost you.

card.name: Rushwood Grove
card.property: Rushwood Grove enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Put a storage counter on Rushwood Grove. {T}, Remove any number of storage counters from Rushwood Grove: Add {G} for each storage counter removed this way.

card.name: Sandstone Needle
card.property: Sandstone Needle enters the battlefield tapped with two depletion counters on it. {T}, Remove a depletion counter from Sandstone Needle: Add {R}{R}. If there are no depletion counters on Sandstone Needle, sacrifice it.

card.name: Saprazzan Cove
card.property: Saprazzan Cove enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Put a storage counter on Saprazzan Cove. {T}, Remove any number of storage counters from Saprazzan Cove: Add {U} for each storage counter removed this way.

card.name: Saprazzan Skerry
card.property: Saprazzan Skerry enters the battlefield tapped with two depletion counters on it. {T}, Remove a depletion counter from Saprazzan Skerry: Add {U}{U}. If there are no depletion counters on Saprazzan Skerry, sacrifice it.

card.name: Subterranean Hangar
card.property: Subterranean Hangar enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Put a storage counter on Subterranean Hangar. {T}, Remove any number of storage counters from Subterranean Hangar: Add {B} for each storage counter removed this way.

card.name: Tower of the Magistrate
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Target creature gains protection from artifacts until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like the city, weakest at its foundation.
